trans-unit.source: We have not received confirmation of your Paypal payment. This can take a few seconds to a few minutes. As soon as we have confirmation of your payment, and all items are on stock, we will ship your order as fast as possible. Attached you also find our general terms and conditions. You will shortly receive an order confirmation from our customer service.
